item.title: Academic Projects | SJTU
item.description:
A small selection of projects completed during my exchange program in Shanghai.
These are standard coursework projects, shared mainly for reference and documentation.

Everything here is written in LaTeX; I describe my setup and workflow in a separate article available here: LaTeX Setup.

Modeling the Melting Behaviour of Pure Ni, Zr, and Ni-Zr Alloys

This project explores melting and phase transitions in pure Ni, Zr, and selected Ni-Zr intermetallic compounds using molecular dynamics simulations (LAMMPS).
The work was carried out as part of a multiscale materials modelling course and focuses on atomistic-level analysis of thermal behaviour.

1. Data Controller

The data controller is Luigi Casagrande, reachable at luigi.casagrande@outlook.it

2. Scope of This Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy describes how personal data are processed when users visit the website https://luigicasagrande.it (the “Website”).

The Website is a static, informational website and does not include forms, newsletters, comment sections, or user accounts.
